sys_transform_map.name: Incident Transformer

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_dbb7671b47fd25105641fef0236d431e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Incident Transformer</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	var incident = new GlideRecord("incident");
	incident.newRecord();
	incident.active = source.active;
	incident.approval = source.approval;
	incident.category = source.category;
	incident.caller_id = source.caller_id;
	incident.impact = source.impact;
	incident.incident_state = source.incident_state;
	incident.priority = source.priority;
	incident.severity = source.severity;
	incident.short_description = source.short_description;
	incident.state = source.state;
	incident.task_effective_number = source.task_effective_number;
	incident.upon_approval = source.upon_approval;
	incident.upon_reject = source.upon_reject;
	incident.urgency = source.urgency;
	incident.insert();

})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_471912_my_test_a_test_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-31 07:08:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>dbb7671b47fd25105641fef0236d431e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incident Transformer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="my test app" source="x_471912_my_test_a">429eea7d471121105641fef0236d4334</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="my test app">429eea7d471121105641fef0236d4334</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_dbb7671b47fd25105641fef0236d431e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-31 07:14:05</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
